entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to a few flurries this evening and ending before morning then clearing. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
